g1.title: Three Michelin Keys — an award for excellence
g1.intro: Recognition for service, atmosphere and exceptional experiences — and motivation to become even better every day.
g1.more: Three Michelin Keys stand for outstanding hospitality, a coherent atmosphere and consistent quality — from the first welcome to the last detail. For us, it’s motivation to refine service and cuisine every day.

g2.title: Among the best: a hotel for discerning tastes
g2.intro: Architecture, location and cuisine meet calm, warmth and first-class service — right on the island.
g2.more: Guests who arrive here seek calm without compromise: spacious rooms, sea views and a house that takes its time. Lounge, concierge or small gestures — what matters is feeling truly welcome.

g3.title: Signature Moments: exceptional — and truly personal
g3.intro: Private  experiences, concierge service and small details that turn a stay into a lasting memory.
g3.more: Signature Moments are experiences we create exclusively for you: private tastings, picnics, tailored tours or a dinner in a special place. This turns a trip into a personal moment that stays.

g4.title: Spa & Wellness: relaxation on a new level
g4.intro: Pool, quiet zones and treatments — designed for regeneration, stillness and renewed energy after a day by the sea.
g4.more: After a day by the water, warmth awaits: pool, relaxation areas and treatments that release tension and restore energy. Gentle scents, soft light and quiet spaces help both mind and body truly switch off.

e1.title: Hidden places of our region
e1.intro: With its lively village center and well-known beaches, the region is among the world’s most appreciated travel destinations. Beyond the hotspots, it also reveals calm and inspiring places.
e1.more: Away from the beaten path, the island reveals its quiet side: small coves, viewpoints by the water and places where nature feels close. Ideal for walks that clear the mind and invite a sense of calm.

e2.title: Inspired by nature: the Grand Restaurant
e2.intro: The Grand Restaurant is an homage to nature and the culinary treasures of the island. Regional produce, fine aromas and quiet elegance define the evening.
e2.more: The Grand Restaurant combines classic elegance with refined regional flavors. Seasonal menus, a calm atmosphere and attentive service — ideal for evenings you’ll remember.
